Params: {2: 'Admin Director', 3: "She's doing well. The staff on the island all like her.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'I\'m not. Everybody likes her. She\'s an "interesting" kid. You can go take a look just to kill some time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'I have no time to "kill," and you shouldn\'t have any either... But I am getting a little curious since even you are making such a comment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In a corner of the medical department.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When Lustrous finds Lamia, this little human has made a tottering tower using the coffee cups others gave her.'}
{3: 'Leaning on the cardboard fence, Lustrous takes away the few cups at the top. The tower wobbles a bit, then becomes balanced again.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lamia raises her head and frowns at Lustrous.'}
{3: 'Lustrous hands the cups back to her. Little Lamia gladly takes them back and smiles.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lustrous writes a few points down in her notebook.'}
{3: 'Extremely low emotional threshold. Emotional shifts can be triggered by tiny stimulations.'}
{3: 'The emotional logic of human infants differs significantly from that of adults. Interesting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Director', 3: "Ma'am, you haven't been here for a long time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Medical Director', 3: "Lamia couldn't talk the last time you were here. Now she can say some basic words.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Lamia stops playing with the coffee cups and looks at her without a clue.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia seems to have understood. She points to herself and utters with an incoherent voice.'}
{3: 'Lustrous shakes her head and makes a few notes.'}
{3: 'In a room of the medical department.'}
{3: "It used to be a ward, but has been transformed into Lamia's personal room with the medical director's special approval."}

{3: 'The desk is made from a pharmacy table, while the infusion chair has been modified into a working chair. Both of them are still too tall for Lamia, as her mechanical legs are unable to touch the ground when she sits on the chair.'}
{3: 'A few lines of simple equations are written on the paper.'}
{3: 'This time, the data director has come to check on Lamia.'}
{3: 'She takes a bow, trying to mimic the action of other staff.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The data director responds half-heartedly, then looks at Lustrous.'}
{2: 'Data Director', 3: 'She does look stupid. Dumb like a monkey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'I heard she was learning mathematics recently.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Data Director', 3: 'The following definition is constructed: addition is an operation which combines two or more numbers into a single number. Define multiplication in the same manner.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Intimidated, Lamia looks at the man in front. She awkwardly twists her fingers into the hem of her dress.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Data Director', 3: 'Alright, next question. There are some chickens and rabbits in a barn. You know there are 35 heads and 94 legs. How many chickens and how many rabbits are there?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "S-sorry, the question is too difficult... I don't know...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Data Director', 3: 'She lowers the IQ of the whole Atlantis.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Data Director', 3: 'I have never witnessed such a foolish creature.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lustrous doesn't realize, but her lips have curled under her mask."}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: "I'm glad that we have reached the same conclusion again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She writes down another two bullet points.'}
